Class VideoContainerTypeEnumProperties | Methods | Constants
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.model
Classpublic class VideoContainerTypeEnum
InheritanceVideoContainerTypeEnum AbstractEnum

The format of the wrapper that provides metadata and describes how the video and audio are stored in the file. Valid values are FLV, MP4, and M2TS. See Supported Video Codecs and Containers for more information.
